quote: I paint with shapes.
author: Alexander Calder

quote: Painting is a nail to which I fasten my ideas.
author: Georges Braque

quote: I don't paint things. I only paint the difference between things.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: Sometimes, you have to step into oblivion, in order to paint success.
author: Lionel Suggs

quote: What I wish to show when I paint is the way I see things with my eyes and in my heart.
author: Raoul Dufy

quote: Paint the essential character of things.
author: Camille Pissarro

quote: Painting completed my life.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: Every good painter paints what he is.
author: Jackson Pollock

quote: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Painting, n.: The art of protecting flat surfaces from the weather, and exposing them to the critic.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: A great artist can paint a great picture on a small canvas.
author: Charles Dudley Warner

quote: Painting is an infinitely minute part of my personality.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: Painting is the passage from the chaos of the emotions to the order of the possible.
author: Balthus

quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Painting is self-discovery. Every good artist paints what he is.
author: Jackson Pollock

quote: A man paints with his brains and not with his hands.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Painting seems like some kind of peculiar miracle that I need to have again and again.
author: Philip Guston

quote: What I wanted to do was to paint sunlight on the side of a house.
author: Edward Hopper

quote: I don't paint dreams or nightmares, I paint my own reality.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Painting is easy when you don't know how, but very difficult when you do.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: My past is black and my future is blank. My only canvas is the present. The best color to paint with is love.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Life is a blank canvas, and you need to throw all the paint on it you can.
author: Danny Kaye

quote: Any customer can have a car painted any colour that he wants so long as it is black.
author: Henry Ford

quote: To do a dull thing with style-now that's what I call art.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: A painter should begin every canvas with a wash of black, because all things in nature are dark except where exposed by the light.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Painting is by nature a luminous language.
author: Robert Delaunay

quote: An artist is forced by others to paint out of his own free will.
author: Willem de Kooning

quote: If we could but paint with the hand what we see with the eye.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Impressionism; it is the birth of Light in painting.
author: Robert Delaunay

quote: A painting that is well composed is half finished.
author: Pierre Bonnard

quote: What is art but a way of seeing?
author: Saul Bellow

quote: Photograph: a picture painted by the sun without instruction in art.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Murder [10w] Two coats of paint doen't get rid of a ghost.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Be a great artist especially when you draw your lifeâ€™s picture.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I decided I would fill the emptiness in me with God and with paint.
author: Kimberly Novosel

quote: Painting and writing are solitary arts.
author: Conrad Hall

quote: When you draw something it lives and when you photograph it it dies
author: John Fowles,  The Collector

quote: A writer should write with his eyes and a painter paint with his ears.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: I am more a friend of art than a producer of painting.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: Lifes like a painters palette, just when you've got everything worked out the colours change
author: Benny Bellamacina,  Piddly Poems for Children

quote: A good painting to me has always been like a friend. It keeps me company, comforts and inspires.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: Art is accusation, expression, passion. Art is a fight to the finish between black charcoal and white paper.
author: Gunter Grass

quote: Dancers are a work of art - they are the canvas on which their work is painted.
author: Patrick Duffy

quote: I challenge you to make your life the masterpiece you want to paint, the novel you want to read, the day you want to wake to.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: If you know somethin' well, you can always paint it but people would be better off buyin' chickens.
author: Grandma Moses

quote: A painter's tastes must grow out of what so obsesses him in life that he never has to ask himself what it is suitable for him to do in art.
author: Lucian Freud

quote: Make your lives a masterpiece, you only get one canvas.
author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly

quote: Draw your pleasure, paint your pleasure, and express your pleasure strongly.
author: Pierre Bonnard
